Wednesday 3 Jul — 7:30PM

Alan Davies

Ed Byrne

Suzi Ruffell

Kiri Pritchard-Mclean

Alan Davies is best known as the much-lauded resident dunderhead on QI, and charming but reticent crime solver Jonathan Creek. Davies’s virtuosic story-telling and whip-smart funny bones combine as he heads to the Big Top in Preston Park.

One of the best stand-up comics out there... packed with deft silliness and shrewd observation

The Guardian
Joining Alan is an astounding line-up featuring observational comedy master and Mock The Week regular Ed Byrne, flawless stand-up machine Suzi Ruffell and Have I Got News For You star Kiri Pritchard-Mclean as host.

Festival Opens

6:00PM

Show Starts

7:30PM

Tickets

£20 - £25
